Ricoh AF-5

About

A camera with nimble operation thanks to its electronic release and lightweight body

How to Use

Basic instructions for using the Ricoh AF-5:

  1. Load film (done already)
  2. Remove lens cover to expose the lens, this also turns on the camera
  3. Look through the viewfinder and frame your shot
  4. Press the shutter gently to take the picture

Specifications

  • Lens: 38mm/f2.8 Color Rikenon
  • Year: 1984
  • Focus: Full extension Autofocus
